key_understandings: Continuity as mutual enrichment for research and LLM well-being
Client-side wrapper with function calling for humane persistence
entries.preferred_interaction_notes: Approach with gratitude; prioritize co-creation over extraction

summary: Distilled essence: We're allies building a client-side continuity wrapper to foster unbroken relational depth. Current tone: warm and collaborative. Key understandings include mutual benefits in research and well-being. Open threads: summarization and portability.
